title: SmartVision V7.5 Hardware and Software Requirements
text: SmartVision V7.5 Hardware and Software Requirements The following hardware and software recommendations are made by K3 based on the experience of our customers and the operating system author’s recommendations. These requirements are effective as January 2025 and are subject to change without notice. SmartVision Server Requirements Server Hardware Minimum Recommended Processor Speed Dual Core Quad Core or greater Memory 4GB 8GB or greater Hard Disk (Free Space) SATA 7200rpm SSD with RAID-5 (SAS) Network Adapter 100 Base-T 1000 Base-T Important Notes Tape Backup and UPS (battery backup) highly recommended. Hardware must comply with operating system author’s hardware compatibility list. Hardware specifications are based on a dedicated server and 20 concurrent users, if the server has additional workloads placed upon it, they should be factored into these recommendations. Recommendation is for a server with 100gb disc capacity. This allows for a live database, a test database, SQL Logs, a number of days of SQL backups and room for expansion as you grow. Server Software Supported Server Operating Systems Windows 2022 server Windows 2019 server Windows 2016 server Microsoft SQL Server Microsoft SQL Server 2022 Microsoft SQL Server 2019 Microsoft SQL Server 2017 Microsoft SQL Server 2016 Important Notes Microsoft .NET 3.5 is required. SmartVision Client Requirements Client Hardware Minimum Recommended Processor Speed 1GHz 2 GHz+ RAM 512MB 1GB+ Hard Disk (Free Space) 5GB 10GB Network Adaptor 100 Base-T 1000 Base-T Display Settings SVGA (1024x768) SVGA (1024 x 768 or greater) * Other Hardware Requirements Hardware must comply with operating system author’s hardware compatibility list. Isolated power circuits with surge protection or UPS recommended. * For high resolution monitors e.g. 4k, please check with your Account Manager Client Software Supported Client Operating Systems Windows 10 Professional or Enterprise Windows 11 Professional or Enterprise Important Notes Microsoft .NET 3.5 is required. For any further details and recommendations please contact Technical Support.
description:
SmartVision V7.5 Hardware and Software Requirements

 

 

The following hardware and software recommendations are made by K3 based on the experience of our customers and the operating system author’s recommendations.

 

These requirements are effective as January 2025 and are subject to change without notice.

 

 

SmartVision Server Requirements 

Server Hardware

 

Minimum

Recommended

Processor Speed

Dual Core

Quad Core or greater

Memory 

4GB

8GB or greater

Hard Disk (Free Space)

SATA 7200rpm

SSD with RAID-5 (SAS)

Network Adapter

100 Base-T

1000 Base-T

Important Notes

  • Tape Backup and UPS (battery backup) highly recommended. 
  • Hardware must comply with operating system author’s hardware compatibility list.
  • Hardware specifications are based on a dedicated server and 20 concurrent users, if the server has additional workloads placed upon it, they should be factored into these recommendations.
  • Recommendation is for a server with 100gb disc capacity. This allows for a live database, a test database, SQL Logs, a number of days of SQL backups and room for expansion as you grow. 

 

Server Software

Supported Server Operating Systems

  • Windows 2022 server
  • Windows 2019 server
  • Windows 2016 server 

Microsoft SQL Server

  • Microsoft SQL Server 2022
  • Microsoft SQL Server 2019
  • Microsoft SQL Server 2017
  • Microsoft SQL Server 2016

Important Notes

  • Microsoft .NET 3.5 is required.

 

 

SmartVision Client Requirements

Client Hardware

 

Minimum

Recommended

Processor Speed

1GHz

2 GHz+

RAM

512MB

1GB+

Hard Disk (Free Space)

5GB

10GB

Network Adaptor

100 Base-T

1000 Base-T

Display Settings

SVGA (1024x768)

SVGA (1024 x 768 or greater) *

Other Hardware Requirements

  • Hardware must comply with operating system author’s hardware compatibility list.
  • Isolated power circuits with surge protection or UPS recommended.
  • * For high resolution monitors e.g. 4k, please check with your Account Manager

Client Software

Supported Client Operating Systems

  • Windows 10 Professional or Enterprise
  • Windows 11 Professional or Enterprise

Important Notes

  • Microsoft .NET 3.5 is required.

 

 

For any further details and recommendations please contact Technical Support.
